title: Zoltar

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Read the mind of one player at night to discover if they are thinking about something.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may choose a player to read their mind and a word. You will discover if the player has the given word in their role card's abilities and/or attributes.
- You may read the minds of five players.

desc:
Post 425
*Ladies and gentlemen, boys and girls. Let Zoltar the Great read your mind!*
